title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! May 4th thru May
description:
Expanding the Consciousness of the entire planet! Coast to Coast with George Noory! Yes, my friends, it is another weekly upload of C2C! I&#039;m sorry I&#039;m a little late, but I&#039;m sure you all expect that from me every now and then. I hope you all enjoy these uploads and I hope you all share them with other sites and many other people. Thanks in advance to the seeders and leechers. Keep it up! Later All! Until we meet again next week. Stokeman Out.......


Sunday May 4th, 2008
Intuition & Synchronicity
In the middle two hours, counselor, educator, and healer Colette Baron-Reid discussed shared consciousness, synchronicity, and the scientific underpinnings of intuition. She described experiencing "retro cognition," knowing details of the past and... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Colette Baron-Reid, Lionel Fanthorpe, Bruce Burgess

Monday May 5th, 2008
Power of the Crystal Skulls
Scientific researcher of ancient artifacts, Richard Shafsky discussed his work with the Mayan crystal skull and how it has conveyed important information about Earth history and changes. He was first introduced to the Mayan skull in the 1970&#039;s via a Mayan... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Richard Shafsky, Al Bielek, Jim Berkland

Tuesday May 6th, 2008
Men, Women, & Stress
Relationship expert Dr. John Gray discussed his latest work on how men and women handle stress differently, due to gender-related chemical differences. Most "lifestyle" diseases are the result of how we respond to stress, he noted. Stress can cause...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): John Gray, Noe Torres, Ruben Uriarte, John M. Curtis, Christian Wilde, Richard C. Hoagland

Wednesday May 7th, 2008
Memoirs of a Remote Viewer
Writer and physicist Russell Targ discussed his new memoir Do You See What I See?, which chronicles his tale as a visually impaired scientist who helped create the Remote Viewing program at SRI, and offers info on how to separate the psychic signal from... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Russell Targ, Dean Pomerleau

Thursday May 8th, 2008
Water as Fuel Supplement
During the middle two hours, Ari Cohen & Fred Gutierrez of water4gas spoke about the technology for converting water into hydrogen, which can be used as a supplement for gasoline or diesel in order to boost performance and increase gas mileage. The... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Walter L. Wagner, Ari Cohen, Fred Gutierrez

Friday May 9th, 2008
Unbelievable True Stories
During Open Lines, George offered a special line for callers who have told true stories to people who would not believe them. Joyce said a 6-ft tall "dark-hooded figure" appeared by her bed one night, with a "small, impish figure" standing next to him.... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Jeffrey L. Peckman

Saturday May 10th, 2008
Rich Get Richer on Gov&#039;t Subsidies
Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter for The New York Times, David Cay Johnston discussed his book, Free Lunch, which exposes how everyone from golf course developers and sports team owners to Paris Hilton and other super rich are getting richer off of government...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): David Cay Johnston, Carl Zimmer

Sunday May 11th, 2008
The Monkey Virus
Investigator Ed Haslam discussed his research into a 1964 murder of a cancer researcher which links to the JFK assassination and the contamination of the polio vaccine. In describing the complex web of intrigue that he had uncovered, he said, "I look... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Ed Haslam, Bob Fletcher

Monday May 12th, 2008
Earth & Solar Changes
Author & researcher Mitch Battros discussed his work on the history and current state of earth changes, including the Sun/Earth connection and the implications of Solar Cycle 24. We&#039;ll see an escalation of earth changes and extreme weather as we move...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Mitch Battros, James McCanney
